title: Why do K-pop idols do live on V Live instead of YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: V live is a South Korean live video streaming platform that allows celebrities based in the country to broadcast live videos on the internet and live chat with fans.  The app was purposefully made for the live streams for Korean celebrities including Kpop idols. It will also be easy for idols who are not fluent in English. Sometimes YouTube crashes in a live stream if the increasing no. of watchers can't be handled. V live brought kpop to our hands and many stick with it. It avoids YouTube's cons.
